biotools.summary: LPMX, i.e, Local Package Manager X, is a pure rootless composable container system. It helps researchers run genome analysis tools via existing Docker or Singularity (experimental) images without root/sudo privilege required. Besides, researchers can benefit from composability, e.g. allowing one to write a pipeline consisting tools from different containers.
